title: Silver Fox APT Uses Winos 4.0 Malware in Cyber Attacks Against Taiwanese Organizations
description: A new campaign is targeting companies in Taiwan with malware known as Winos 4.0 as part of phishing emails masquerading as the country's National Taxation Bureau. The campaign, detected last month by Fortinet FortiGuard Labs, marks a departure from previous attack chains that have leveraged malicious game-related applications.
